Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Manchester in 1977...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1981, off Brandon Kelly (NJ)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/12/1981, off Joe Cipolla (Min)...

Drove in 7 runs against Lynchburg on 6/26/1988...
Won World Championship with Boston (UBA) in 1988...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/13/1990 to a 4-year deal worth $3,805,800 per year...
